title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 7.32 - Regular employee lists for new piers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 7.32 - Regular employee lists for new piers

State Regulations

Regular employee lists for new piers shall be established
from longshoremen identified with the section in which the employer's pier or
terminal is located on the basis of seniority in the
industry. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
7.32

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
